resources.string: The Big Incredible and Funny Treasure Hunt 2.0 with 30% more Fun - For Free
"Audio replay is currently not working. Restarting the game or phone might help."
The placement of the levels is randomly chosen when you start a game. Here is a list of all possible levels. To see the help for an individual level click on its icon!
To lose part of your treasure play the level of your choice by pressing its icon. Levels that are marked with a question mark cannot be played yet.

Choose one of the menu items to continue the last game, to start a new game, or to see the credits. \nOnce you started a game you will see a map that displays the levels you can currently play and your progress of your quest to lose your treasure.
The Big Incredible and Funny Treasure Hunt
Not there yet! Play a different level to get there!
"Thanks to everybody who contributed to this project:"
"To start a level, press a button that is ahead and already visible!"
"To reach this point you have to lose more money! Press a level icon that is already visible!"
"Congratulations - You lost all your wealth! Do you already feel your newly gained freedom!"

(English)Jeder kennt die Situation: Man spielt ein Jump \'n\' Run Level und sammelt fleißig Münzen. Doch kaum einer hat sich schon einmal Gedanken darüber gemacht, wer diese ganzen Levels für den nächsten Helden befüllt.\n\nGenau hier bist du gefragt! Bestücke das leergeräumte Level wieder mit Münzen, und zwar so schnell, wie möglich. Denn etwas haben Helden nicht - und das ist Geduld.
